llm.feedback:
Up | 3–6 months | Cloud/AI capex regime underpins durable earnings with Microsoft cloud metrics (Q4 FY2025 revenue $76.4B, +18% YoY; Azure growth 39%; backlog $368B, +37% YoY) and Shopify profitability signals (net income $906M; free cash flow $422M), anchored by Grand View Research’s cloud spend CAGR of 21.2% to about $2.4T through 2030; What to watch: Azure/backlog trajectory and broader cloud demand signals; Probability 65% (0G3A676BP)(TN66GHPAT)

Up | 0–3 weeks | Sanctuary injunction covering roughly 30 jurisdictions including Los Angeles compresses policy-risk premium and triggers a 15% retention bonus tranche; sanctuary-status updates shaping sentiment (U1KRCQOYR); What to watch: status updates, payout progress, and resilience-hardware demand signals from Synology BeeStation Plus (8VMO3PFEO), TP-Link Deco XE75 Pro (4S007SRUL), and Anker Solix F3800 Home Power System (5); Probability 60% (U1KRCQOYR)(8VMO3PFEO)(4S007SRUL)(5)

Down | 3–6 months | EV/subsidy regime policy risk intensifies as credits expiration risk, tariffs, and policy continuity tests reprice EV equities, even as Rivian’s R2 ramp (launch 2026) with VW backing and a DOE loan (~$6.6B) plus ~$7.5B cash could lift margins if policy remains supportive (P0K0UEOHU); What to watch: Rivian R2 cost structure and ramp milestones; Probability 40% (P0K0UEOHU)

Down | 0–3 months | Inflation persistence and policy ambiguity keep risk assets vulnerable; July CPI at 2.7% and ~70% priced in for a 50bp Fed cut imply potential for a policy surprise that could lift real rates and push the dollar higher, while a clearer easing path would reinforce dollar weakness and tighter spreads (V7GV8YBQU)(C3ODMIQKZ)(GX057ADL7)(RHXDOHQQX); What to watch: CPI path, Fed communications, and tariff/policy updates; Probability 70% (V7GV8YBQU)(C3ODMIQKZ)(GX057ADL7)(RHXDOHQQX)
